title: Minneapolis Protests Turn VIOLENT – That Doesn’t Help! | 5/28/20
description:
Protests in Minneapolis over the death of George Floyd turned into violent riots, complete with store burnings and lootings. We were all on the same page here, so why trash the community? The CDC now says that the coronavirus MAY spread on contaminated surfaces, and experts warn that six feet of distancing may not be enough. The U.S. has surpassed 100K deaths, but the media doesn’t care unless it can bash Trump. Trump plans to sign an executive order after Twitter fact-checked him. The internet is mad that John Krasinski sold “Some Good News” to CBS. And YouTuber Myka Stauffer is facing heat for “rehoming” an adopted kid with special needs. Twitter’s head fact-checker has a history of anti-Trump tweets. Should Twitter be able to censor people?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
